greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle t(n,m) = prime(m)*prime(n-m)*binomial(n,m) read by rows, 0<=m<=n.
comment: For the purpose of this sequence define prime(0)=1.
mathematica: Table[Table[If[n == m ==0, 1, If[m == 0 || m == n, Prime[n], (Prime[n - m]*Prime[m])*Binomial[n, m]]], {m, 0, n}], {n, 0, 10}] Flatten[%]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 23 2008
